text:
Automox | Frontend, Backend, Quality, Scrummaster | Boulder, CO | ONSITE | automox.com

Automox's cloud-based platform fully automates patch remediation across Windows, Linux, Mac, and 3rd party software. We focus on quality, friendly user interfaces and experiences, and effective software for the mid-market and enterprise.

Learn more and apply at https://www.automox.com/careers!
